Name: Odor Sleuth
Effect: Single Target. The Foe cannot Evade Moves performed by the User. User ignores Ghost-Type immunity to Normal and Fight-Type Moves and vice versa. Out of battle, Add successes of this Move to any roll for Tracking targets.
Description: The Pok√©mon uses their keen sense of smell to corner the foe and find it when it tries to scurry away
